properties.description: Name of a Cluster. You can use any non-white space character in the name

properties.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource

properties.name: ClusterArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: Deployment status of a resource. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.
